page.title: 06School Memories
page.content: Mr Woodrow who is nearly 70 years old told us about some of the incidents that happened when he was at school. Once on his way to school he saw some apples so he decided to go and 'pinch' some. As he was doing this his headmaster went past. So when Mr Woodrow got to school his headmaster said, "Woodrow, stand on my line." He had the cane and afterwards he sat on his hands in pain. Another time Mr Woodrow and his friends were walking to school and somebody went by on their bike and greeted them ;but he and his friends did not reply. Unfortunately his headmaster came by and when they got to school they had to walk around the playground and every time they got to their head they had to take off their hats and say,"Hello," until 12.00.
